thread.title: Watch Win Butler’s NBA All-Star Celebrity Game Highlights
thread.title_full: Watch Win Butler’s NBA All-Star Celebrity Game Highlights

author: Pitchfork
title: Watch Win Butler’s NBA All-Star Celebrity Game Highlights
text:
Watch Win Butler’s NBA All-Star Celebrity Game Highlights He led the East with 22 points and 11 rebounds Win Butler Photo by Jonathan Bachman/Getty Images 
Arcade Fire ’s Win Butler returned for his third NBA All-Star Celebrity Game , joining Caleb McLaughlin (“Stranger Things”), Master P and his son Romeo, Mark Cuban, Nick Cannon, Peter Rosenberg, and more. The reigning MVP led the East to a blowout 88-59 win with 22 points and 11 rebounds (in Jimi Hendrix socks ). Despite his performance, he lost the MVP to NBA impersonator Brandon Armstrong, who finished with 16 points and 15 rebounds. Watch highlights from Butler’s performance below, including getting scored on by 14-year-old Saints fan Jarrius Robertson . 
In addition to his play, Win Butler also took part in the mid-game Mannequin Challenge that took place. He was coached by ESPN anchor Jemele Hill, DJ Khaled, and Fat Joe. Last year, Butler lead Team Canada to an All-Star Game win under head coach Drake. 
Read Pitchfork’s 2015 and 2016 scouting reports on Butler.
